official_title: A bill to manage certain lands within the Prineville District of the Oregon Division of the Bureau of Land Management for hunting, fishing and recreational purposes, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish within the Prineville District of the Oregon Division of the Bureau of Land Management an area of specified public lands to be managed for hunting, fishing, and recreational purposes. Authorizes appropriations from the Land and Water Conservation Fund for necessary land purchases.

titles.title: A bill to manage certain lands within the Prineville District of the Oregon Division of the Bureau of Land Management for hunting, fishing and recreational purposes, and for other purposes.
